Text: Yes! Thank you for this awesome torrent - yet another great one! Crisp, clear and dynamic as always :-)

Thanks for the effort, BUT unfortunately this sounds worse than an mp3 version I have.  This sounds compressed dull on the edges and closed-in.  A lot of us can do "24-96 vinyl rips", but I for one don't have good enough vinyl playback to beat a CD or even a high rate MP3, so I don't do it.

Thanks for the feedback.  I have to disagree, though.  I just downloaded an MP3 version and I cannot agree.  Maybe you could upload the versions you have that sound better, and share with the rest of us?
The quality is undoubtedly awesome and special thanks for the artwork. :)

Could you please do the Born & Raised, and the Battlestudies album?

Also, I'd really like to have the Mark Knopfler's Get Lucky album!!

THANKS!

It's strange, I can listen to this fine on my laptop and it sounds great. But when I try to stream it through my PS3 it sounds terrible, like there's too much dust on the record. But I can stream other FLAC files fine on the PS3. Anyone have any ideas?
